name: express-gateway-keycloak
description: Keycloak plugin for aiotes api express gateway integration

scripts.compile: tsc --skipLibCheck -p . && cp package.json build/ && npm install --production --prefix build/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run package
scripts.buildDocker: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run package && docker build -t express-gw-keycloak:develop .
scripts.clean: npm run cleanBuild && npm rum cleanPackage

author: Activage
